privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.intro: Welcome to 'CatchUp' (hereinafter referred to as 'this Website'). To ensure that you can use the services and information of this Website with peace of mind, we hereby explain the privacy protection policy of this Website to protect your rights. Please read the following content carefully:

scope.title: 1. Scope of Privacy Protection Policy
scope.content: The content of the privacy protection policy covers how this Website handles personally identifiable information collected when you use the website services. The privacy protection policy does not apply to related linked websites outside of this Website, nor does it apply to personnel not commissioned or involved in the management of this Website.

collection.title: 2. Collection, Processing, and Use of Personal Data
content: When you visit this Website or use the functional services provided by this Website, we will ask you to provide necessary personal data depending on the nature of the service function, and process and use your personal data within the scope of that specific purpose; without your written consent, this Website will not use personal data for other purposes.
This Website will retain your name, email address, contact information, and usage time when you use interactive functions such as service mailboxes and questionnaires.

During general browsing, the server will automatically record relevant actions, including the IP address of the connecting device, usage time, browser used, browsing and clicking data records, etc., as a reference for us to improve website services. This record is for internal application and will never be released to the outside world.

To provide precise services, we will conduct statistics and analysis on the collected questionnaire contents. The statistical data or explanatory text of the analysis results will be presented. In addition to internal research, we will publish statistical data and explanatory text as needed, but it will not involve specific personal data.
You may request us to correct or delete your account or personal data collected by this Website at any time. Please see the contact channel at the bottom for contact information.

protection.title: 3. Protection of Data
content: The hosts of this Website are equipped with various information security equipment such as firewalls and antivirus systems and necessary security protection measures to protect the website and your personal data using strict protection measures. Only authorized personnel can access your personal data. Relevant processing personnel have signed confidentiality agreements. Anyone who violates confidentiality obligations will be subject to relevant legal penalties.

If it is necessary to entrust other units to provide services due to business needs, this Website will also strictly require them to comply with confidentiality obligations and take necessary inspection procedures to ensure that they will indeed comply.

links.title: 4. Related Links to the Outside World
links.content: The web pages of this Website provide internet links to other websites. You can also click to enter other websites through the links provided by this Website. However, the privacy protection policy of this Website does not apply to the linked website. You must refer to the privacy protection policy in the linked website.

sharing.title: 5. Policy on Sharing Personal Data with Third Parties
content: This Website will never provide, exchange, rent, or sell any of your personal data to other individuals, groups, private enterprises, or public agencies, unless there is a legal basis or contractual obligation.
The circumstances of the proviso in the preceding paragraph include but are not limited to:
list: To eliminate danger to your life, body, freedom, or property.

Cooperation with public agencies or academic research institutions is necessary for statistics or academic research based on public interest, and the data has been processed by the provider or collected in a way that the specific party cannot be identified by its disclosure method.

When your behavior on the website violates the terms of service or may damage or hinder the rights and interests of the website and other users or cause damage to anyone, the website management unit analyzes and discloses your personal data as necessary to identify, contact, or take legal action.
Conducive to your rights and interests.

When this Website commissions manufacturers to assist in collecting, processing, or using your personal data, it will fulfill its responsibility of supervision and management of the outsourced manufacturers or individuals.

cookies.title: 6. Use of Cookies
cookies.content: In order to provide you with the best service, this Website will place and access our Cookies on your computer. If you do not wish to accept the writing of Cookies, you can set the privacy level to high in the browser functions you use to reject the writing of Cookies, but it may lead to some functions of the website not executing properly.

amendment.title: 7. Amendment of Privacy Protection Policy
amendment.content: The privacy protection policy of this Website will be amended at any time in response to needs, and the amended terms will be published on the website.

refund_policy.title: CatchUp Refund Policy
refund_policy.intro: Thank you for choosing our product/service. We provide secure payment services through Paddle and are committed to providing customers with a good purchasing experience. The following is our refund policy:

cancellation.title: 1. Consumer Cancellation Rights
cancellation.content: If you are a consumer, you have the right to cancel this agreement and return the product within 14 days without giving any reason. The cancellation period will expire 14 days after the day the transaction is completed. To meet the cancellation deadline, you just need to send your communication concerning your exercise of the right to cancel to Paddle before the cancellation period has expired.

discretion.title: 2. Refund Discretion
discretion.content:
Refunds will be determined entirely by our Merchant of Record, Paddle. If you believe you have a valid reason for a refund, please apply at paddle.net. Refund requests may be rejected depending on the circumstances. If Paddle finds evidence of fraud, refund abuse, or other manipulative behavior that entitles Paddle to a counterclaim, Paddle will reject the refund request.

You can also learn more about refund and dispute policies in Paddle's 'Checkout Buyer Terms and Conditions'.

process.title: 3. Refund Application Process
process.content: If you meet the above refund conditions, please submit an application within 14 days of purchase and provide the following information:
list: Reason for refund and relevant screenshots (if applicable)
process.note: Our order and payment process is handled by the online reseller Paddle. Paddle is the Merchant of Record for all our orders. Paddle also handles all customer service-related matters and returns. If you encounter any problems during the payment process, please visit paddle.net.

merchant.title: 4. Paddle as Merchant
merchant.content: Our payments and order processing are handled by our third-party partner Paddle.com. Paddle is our authorized merchant, and all transaction records and refund processes are handled by Paddle and comply with its policies. In case of disputes or additional refund requests, Paddle may also assist as a neutral party in the review. For detailed consumer rights and service policies, please see Paddle's 'Checkout Buyer Terms and Conditions'.

Refund Policy: Paid amounts are non-refundable, but you retain access until the end of the billing cycle. For refund requests due to disputes, please see our Refund Policy.

changes.title: 6. Changes and Termination
content: Changes: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Modified terms will be published on the website and take effect immediately.
Termination: If you disagree with updated terms, stop using the Service immediately. Continued use implies acceptance. We may terminate your account for violations without notice or refund.

privacy.content: We respect your privacy and protect your personal data according to our Privacy Policy. Please refer to our Privacy Policy for details.
